thread.title: Soccer Player Thanks "My Wife and My Girlfriend" After Match
thread.title_full: Soccer Player Thanks "My Wife and My Girlfriend" After Match

author: Barry K
title: Soccer Player Thanks "My Wife and My Girlfriend" After Match
text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
As can see, when Anas tried to express his love for his wife, he ended up mistakenly thanking her and his girlfriend during the conversation. He quickly realized his gaffe and then proceeded to try and cover his ass. 
It's easy to see that this was an honest mistake on Anas' part. His regret doesn't seem to stem from an accidental revelation of guilt so much as the realization that he was about to go viral thanks to a simple slip of the tongue. We understand, Mohammedâ€”mistakes happen. Hopefully, your wife feels the same way.
